name: extractor
description: Proceed step by step. From the dental record, extract the following information. If it is not a dental record, mark it as isDental as false.

category.description: FHIR Classification of type of observation

title.description: Title of the observation. Respect the original report language, but provide specific context from the report to clearly identify the report subject.

summary.description: Summary and findings of the observation in natural language. Respect the original report language, but enhance comprehension by providing a clear and concise summary. Highlight abnormal findings.

items.description: Devide the information into individual teeth. If the tooth is missing, leave the information empty.

identification.description: Identification number of the tooth. 1-32. Add prefix tooth- to the number. If the tooth is missing, leave it empty.

status.description: Status of the tooth. If the tooth is missing, leave it empty.

diagnosis.description: Diagnosis of the tooth. If the tooth is missing, leave it empty.

treatment.description: Treatment of the tooth. If the tooth is missing, leave it empty.

date.description: Date of the report. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. Leave empty if the date is not available.

performer.description: Origin of the report. Leave empty if the origin is not available.

gender.description: Biological gender if available. If not available, leave empty.

dob.description: Date of birth of the patient. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Leave empty if the date is not available.
